website_summaries.verdict: A complete patio misting kit that hooks directly to your hose  and can be installed in just about any location.
pros: Includes both snap clips and hanging clamps so you can install this kit just about anywhere
Easy assembly makes it possible to set up the entire system within minutes
You can purchase a splitter to attach two units to one hose
Able to place fans in front of the misters to create a directional stream
cons: Only half the tubing contains nozzles, so only 10 feet of the system can actually produce a mist

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, too few sprayers to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money unless you're interested in misting a tiny little area. I bought this expecting to hang it around the edge of a patio umbrella. Unfortunately, there are only 5 sprayers, spaced about 18" apart. Besides that the tubing it's built from is very stiff, so, it's impossible to make it go where you want it to go. Then, if you're disappointed, like me, it's $6.95 to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Myles M

customer_reviews.title: Adjust the nozzles after a trial run
customer_reviews.text: Misting system is great. Easy to install. Installed in less than 20 minutes. Only had one problem; when first turned the system on,I had a steady stream of water from the last nozzle. I took the nozzle off and blew it out. Working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Exiting Places It Shouldn't!!!
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 stars but the water shoots out of the connection to the water hose more than the mist nozzles. No other parts or instructions on how to stop this.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonR.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mister
customer_reviews.text: Easy Setup- Just connect to your hose and you're done! Unlike the Orbit Misting Kits, this one contains both mounting options: hanging snap clips and hanging clamps. The connection has a built-in filter washer, which is a nice touch, but for places with hard water you'll definitely need a filter before feeding the hose to this. Overall, this purchase is a great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Noobenaga

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because it came with the nozzle connector off of the tubing but luckily it went back on with a little pressure. It is nice to have the nozzles to rotate but you cannot turn them off. If you could have been able to choose the length of the tubing it would have been better. Also I don't mind the tubing being stiff but it still is hard to bend. That said, it seems to better because it won't leak as readily. I had to put in another rubber washer because my hose didn't twist in all the way due to the screen which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, some of the nozzles leak though.
customer_reviews.text: This kid is a really good value for the price that I paid, but there are some drawbacks to it. The biggest drawback was that some of the misting points leak, which we didn't find a b a very big deal. However, if you're looking for a better qualities that you might want to pay a little bit more and get one that may not leak as much. The clips that came with these are very helpful, we ended up connecting them to an outdoor patio umbrella, which worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Meggalicious

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: By reading the prior reviews I wasn’t really sure if I should try this product. But due to how inexpensive it was I decided to. I have to say I am pleasantly surprised at how well the system works. I have just a small area to cool so the length is perfect!. The only thing that’s a little annoying is that being the tubing is rolled up it’s hard to straighten out enough to mount but I used zip ties which worked better than the hangers they provide.
customer_reviews.author: ormiga

customer_reviews.title: way too much water
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to set up. Mists under our gazebo nicely. Cools the air and makes for a much more pleasant patio Update. Puts out way too much water, while it is a mist the amount of water makes it impossible to use directly over the table. I added a pressure regulator to reduce the line pressure to the mister. It helped but not enough to make it usable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Water water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Water spurting, dripping, spraying from nozzles and tube connections with my hose barely being on. Water was absolutely all over my porch in about 2 minutes. Not a mister as much as a slow sprinkler. This is my 2nd attempt from amazon, the first purchase from a different seller, that one was junk too. Giving up.
customer_reviews.author: TDunc

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cooling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get a cooling mist on my back porch that turns into a oven in the late afternoon. I clipped it along the gutter and turn it on, very lightly, in the afternoon. The porch is much cooler and my house is about 5 degrees cooler due to the cooler porch. My water bill went up about $5.00 per month. This was worth the money and I am going to pack it up and store it for next year.
customer_reviews.author: GiftBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over pressurize your lines.
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella mister. You will need to order 2 to fit the circle of a standard patio umbrella. Like others have written you will need to get down at the big box store. I just used one 3 way fitting to make a T at the down spout and run the second line around the other half of my umbrella with 2 terminating ends meeting at the end of the loop. Done deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a tent isn’t enough!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BBQ party saver. The fans weren’t cutting down on the heat but this was able to keep everyone cool. Impressive cooling for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would of read reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: Had same problem as others connection to hose can not withstand any pressure and blows out. Although setup was extremely easy with the supplied clips. Going to try gluing the hose connection to see if that remedies the problem. I would of bought a more expensive unit if I had known it would require extra work.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Green

customer_reviews.title: Sun degradation problems. Works with standard 3/8" OD SharkBite fittings.
customer_reviews.text: Not a multi-season solution. Purchased/installed a year ago. Attached to patio umbrella. 1st use this summer (1 year later) the hose material failed, apparently degraded from sun exposure. Originally the product worked well and accepted standard 3/8" SharkBite fittings for customization. If kept out if the sun, product might last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Works, but leaks
customer_reviews.text: It basically works, but leaks at compression joints, needs silicon adhesive or tape to seal -- don't install overhead or over your table! Not enough mounting clips. Mounting clips are soft plastic so the tubing pops out if any stress. I had to add a custom hose to extend the lead length for my installation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Madigan

customer_reviews.title: Leaking/drip from spray nozzles
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned them but decided to just deal with the drip that comes from each sides of where the spray nozzles are attached to the hose. (I barely turn the water on still hoping less pressure will help) The heat is upon us and we’re getting ready for a party and I need to keep the patio area cool. I may try silicone to stop the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ishop, there4 I am

customer_reviews.title: ... thought I had all the goodies for my pool fun. But I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Here in sunny Florida I thought I had all the goodies for my pool fun. But I was wrong! Adding this mister over the chaise lounge area is the best! And super easy to install! Probably amongst the best addition I've made! (With the exception of my wonderful lady friend!) I highly recommend this product! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: david blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent spraying, dripping and nothing at all.
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt wait to install this listing system and I have had nothing but issues. I can’t get the listing to be consistent; after blowing out the nozzles, it mists for a minute and drips again. I can get the middle two nozzles to work fairly well but the first two and last two either drip or do nothing at all. After all the issues, it’s too late to return. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: BellaGirl79

customer_reviews.title: This has worked great all summer
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great all summer, I have used this to keep my Chickens cool under an very large oak tree, It did not hurt the water bill at all. Great product, If my chickens were satisfied so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Goose Geeslin

customer_reviews.title: Do what they were designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 sets of these on our patio for a patio party we had planned for July. They worked great and made our Texas patio pleasant for the party. Several of our guests were so impressed that they have ordered these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for a couple of days. But we did have drippage and our nozzles clogged up pretty quickly. The most wasn’t bad, but soaked everything pretty fast. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Maegan H.

customer_reviews.title: This garbage leaks at every connector
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! This garbage leaks at every connector. (on the positive side, if you don't mind the leaks, it IS extra water to cool your space!) The tubing is too stiff. The snaps are too tight to fit around the tubing and they "pop" off far too easily. It's a waste of $20.00. (Yet I won't even spend $$ sending it back. Just want to advise others considering this to avoid it and research alternatives!)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent misting system
customer_reviews.text: It is currently 110° on my deck, and it would be absolutely unbearable if it weren’t for our misting system. We have been very happy with the ease of use and configuration. It brings the seating area down a good 20° so we can still enjoy our outdoor space. Plus it keeps flies away. We are very pleased with our purchase and plan to take it on vacation with us.
customer_reviews.author: MommaJo

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. The misting is great and I do not have issues with tips dripping water. I have recommend this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Edge

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a Junk Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Junk. Misted leak at joints where the couple together. Dont waist your money!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Roca

customer_reviews.title: I don't like, but it is cheaper to keep them than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought, I don't like, but it is cheaper to keep them than send them back. Next time I will buy something with at least 12-20 nozzles like I should have, this one has 6 nozzles and won't even fit around and umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Eynon

customer_reviews.title: Set it up (not easy as the snaps open up easily) and turned it ...
customer_reviews.text: Set it up (not easy as the snaps open up easily) and turned it on. Worked well for about 10 minutes and then the last nozzle flew off. Shot off like a gun shot. I still can't find where it ended up. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought his for a bbq. Worked perfectly in 104 heat in the sac valley of California. Just a slight drip from the connector but that’s it. Misters worked perfect and the dogs and our guests were perfectly content outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive way to cool off!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any deck or patio for hot summer days! Very flexible and easy to adapt for hanging just about anywhere. We hung ours under our umbrella & it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: beckr721

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Big Time!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks badly at every connection, and the clips are too shallow to be effective for hanging. There was also a couple of the clips that were defextuvs
customer_reviews.author: Allen D

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, let it sit in the sun for about 20 minuites and it uncoiled nicely. I had concern over reviews of it dripping; however if you dont set the water pressure too high then you'll be fine. Not a bad but for 14 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Patrick meeks

customer_reviews.title: incomplete item
customer_reviews.text: works for what we got it for but did not come with snap clips and mounts. I was able to use some other things to hang it with.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Seiber

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to attach to the tent for our ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to attach to the tent for our daughters graduation party since it was so hot, it was a hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Behun

customer_reviews.title: Complete customer Care
customer_reviews.text: Getting hot here and this product works as advertised. I had a little glitch and the seller took no time rectifying it to my complete satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: TexNole

customer_reviews.title: Best Summer heat cooler!
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time, they installed in less then 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very short misting area
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the 20 foot in the description. The whole thing might be 20 ft long but it is mostly hose. The misting area is only about 6 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic way to keep cool!
customer_reviews.text: This Mister is fantastic! My young adult grandchildren put it up quickly and had it working in no time! Our 100 plus degree weather was not such a problem with the controllable mist around our gazebo!
customer_reviews.author: LadyLinda88

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the initial product I received but when I contacted the seller, they immediately provided a replacement and I am very satisfied. Very good product and we enjoy using it with our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Cheap and connections have drip leaks as well. Don’t waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: It leaking not a good setup.
customer_reviews.text: It leaked at all the fittings joint set all the joints not long after starting it.needs more space between the fogers. My old one, is better than this one. Do not bye this.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw Customs & Hotrods

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest investment, its been hot around here lately and i have this connected to my portable gazebo/tent, and the whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Cools any area very well and quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Cools down our patio with very little water. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Item works as expect. There is some leaking but I did not mind. I bought this to attach to my outside dog kennel since it has been so hot/it helps keep them cool. Reduces temperature in the kennels and they love it. Would be 5 stars if it didn' t leak, but the leaks can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: heather bowen

customer_reviews.title: Works well, price is great
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly the way I thought they would. They are very easy to use and set up. They worked like a charm and sprayed evenly.
customer_reviews.author: izzyfree

customer_reviews.title: So nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mister on my pergola. It feels cool and you can adjust how much mist comes out by twisting the little nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: The tube for the misters keeps popping out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tube for the misters keeps popping out of the hose connection. Even when I use it on low flow. I have had many misters for my chickens, and never had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Exactaly what we need in this hotTexas weather! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: This misting system is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It will cool you down quickly. It also doesn’t seem to ise much water. I just barely turn the hose on and it works!
customer_reviews.author: The Crazy Denhams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for the hot days we are getting. Easy to assemble and you can turn the nozzles 360 to any direction you want. I will be using this through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price! Super easy setup! I’ve been using it for over a month now and it’s still working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for my rv
customer_reviews.text: I used this while camping In my rv. It cools the area and my friends and I enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for and at a great price. Has really been an asset in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and at a great price. Has really been an asset in this Texas heat. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth it
customer_reviews.text: On the fine line of not worth the money even if cheap.... several leaks .... kinda loud nozzles don’t adjust that well and not flexible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved our outdoor party!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! It was 96 degrees for a graduation bbq so we ordered this to cool our guests down. It would have been an indoor party if we hadn’t purchased it! Came just in time, thanks to 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The misting system is a great addition to my home. It was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: XLENT transaction-AS described-PROMPT shipping-HIGHLY recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: California Gal

customer_reviews.title: Missing spray nossles
customer_reviews.text: Missing little caps for the mister part, but still works just some drip instead of mist :( so just ok
customer_reviews.author: A. Hollgarth

customer_reviews.title: Watch the hose end. Needs glue
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to glue the end solid so it doesn’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Works well as an a/c mister but, tends to come apart easily at the joints.
customer_reviews.author: 16copper

customer_reviews.title: I gave it away
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't install well, doesn't hang well, color isn't white. I gave it away. I will invest in a better system. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lineberry

customer_reviews.title: great product. Easy to hook up and attach and ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. Easy to hook up and attach and it doesn't drench you. Super fine mist helps keep you cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renee Gillstrom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my chickens in this hot Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: iRENE hENRY

customer_reviews.title: Ikris Misting System
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my barns for my mini rabbits. They work great! If one stops working I just rub my thumb nail over it and it starts spraying again. I'm looking for a way to hook them together and splice in more misters in the area void of misters.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Wraps

customer_reviews.title: Broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and the hose connector broke away from the sprayers after very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: these are sturdy, Really cools an area down
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert. these are sturdy, Really cools an area down.
customer_reviews.author: JosephKennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cool Camping
customer_reviews.text: I liked the subtle mist, just enough to cool without getting too wet.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy C. Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, plastic clips break easily, hose not able to straighten even if left in warm sun.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Attached to pop up tent and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for what we needed, not as heavy duty as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer arntz

customer_reviews.title: GOOD JOB!
customer_reviews.text: I sent 2 other MISTER SETS back to Amazon, before realizing they weren't the IKRIS I had purchased before. The other 2 returned sets had smaller tubing and the spacing for the misters were further apart. I did have to purchase more tubing HANGERS. The SNAP hangers will NOT work on patio wood.
customer_reviews.author: Judy  saylorBuzis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had the results of others. Hooked it up and three sprayers popped out of the system. Found one. The others are currently in the pool. Should have just gone with the fan I was looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in EVV

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the quality when I ordered it (with the price being so great), but it works perfect. Just what we needed for our crazy hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Miller.K

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great around umbrella . Keeps everyone around table cool
customer_reviews.author: ronnie cessna

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install, the hose is not flexible, the mounts are fragile and break.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Slavin

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Would be better if you could connect multiple to cover a larger area. Also if used for a while will get tables and chairs under them wet.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: immediate return
customer_reviews.text: connection dislodged immediately from hose. every mister leaked profusely. you get what you pay for. spend the money and either make one yourself or buy a better system.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good system. Mist is too wet even with the water turned to minimum. The end mister came off the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item. Kept the kids cool an entertained on those hot summer days as well as keeping the grass green

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: We were able to install quickly on our patio, and enjoy a refreshing mist. Think it will be fine. Our dogs loved it!

customer_reviews.text: This mister is junk. Leaks at the joints and was missing one head. Don’t waste your money on these

customer_reviews.title: Shark tooth technology works great
customer_reviews.text: Shark tooth technology and able to put it wherever we wanted made this a great addition to our patio

customer_reviews.title: Used to keep cool
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Hot day used it for my party to keep cool.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, get a long one.
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time last night. Worked great. You can’t connect them to other misters so make sure you buy one long enough to cover the area you want to cover.

customer_reviews.title: The mister tips were ok
customer_reviews.text: Every fitting leaked , this is more like drip line not mister

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep my flock of chickens cool during the summer. It worked great until a rabbit bit through the hose.

customer_reviews.text: Good product, however the tubing popped out of the part that screws to the hose. Used super glue, hope it holds.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

customer_reviews.text: Those little clips weren't helpful. We had to use zipties. It worked well with them though!

customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 10 minutes when the hose attachment blew off. Ended up having to glue the hose connection on as it wouldn’t hold pressure without blowing off.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Pro:Very easy to install within minutes. Con: only 6 misters and 20 feet of hose

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for an outdoor wedding, when we were ...

customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my uncle to keep his patio cool and he loves it. Awesome for the price

customer_reviews.text: We put it up and notice one misting nozzle is missing. So anoying!

product_meta.title: ikris Portable Patio Outdoor Misting System 20Ft SuperCooling Heat Relief Premium Cooling Kit
product_meta.description: The ikris Deluxe Misting Kit brings you fast, easy, and portable cooling! Lower surrounding temperatures by up to 20 degrees at a fraction of the cost of air conditioning. Perfect for use during Summer Barbeques, Outdoor Events, Tanning, and watching Sporting activities. Also great for keeping pets cool in the outdoors. Attach to a fan to instantly create convection of mist! Care Use a water filter when using in a place of hard water. Hard water and Minerals will clog up the nozzle openings over time! Drain misting line before prolonged inactivity to avoid stagnant water. Shut off the lead valve when not in use Avoid Freezing temperatures empty misting line at the end of the season and store in a cool, dry place. Do not overtighten connector. Read all directions and instructions before using this product. Use only as directed. Fits all standard U.S. hose thread connections (3/4).Avoid dropping on floor. For the most up to date information, directions, and care, please visit
feature_bullets: Make sure this fits. by entering your model number.
Keep cool and beat the heat: Decreases the surrounding area by up to 20 F! 10 feet lead line, 10 feet of Mist Cooling Coverage.
Easy Setup: Preassembled kit is ready to mist in 5 minutes!
